text: America ’ s Got Talent returns to TV this week, but a familiar face won ’ t be in the mix. Nick Cannon hosted the show for eight seasons, but he quit after Season 12 ( and was later replaced by Tyra Banks ) after NBC threatened to fire him for ridiculing the network in his Showtime comedy special Stand Up, Don ’ t Shoot.
